posts.content:
Just shipped: dodge & tackle in The Tinkerer's Tournament! 🎲

Leaving opponent's zone?
Dodge roll vs tackle roll.

Success = smooth moves
Failure = faceplant

#gamedev #indiedev #buildinpublic

🧵 1/5

Character dodge/tackle values:

🛡️ Fighter: 2/2
Bash machine - clumsy but sticky

🏃 Runner: 4/1
Slippery soap - can't pin enemies

🧙 Specialist: 3/0
Decent dodging, zero tackling

🧵 2/5

Implementation: ~20min
- Find highest tackle nearby
- Roll dodge vs tackle
- Handle results

Simple mechanics = most fun!

Code at GitHub: https://github.com/Maeevick/the-tinkerers-tournament

🧵 3/5

posts.content:
Design choice: Failed dodge = fall down, not team turnover like in BloodBowl.

Why? No depth yet (no rerolls/skills) to make turnovers fun vs frustrating.

Game feel > mechanical purity.

🧵 4/5

Build in Public = showing your process.

Weekly dev updates every Sunday in Maeevick's Bazaar newsletter.

🎙️ What excites YOU in multiplayer games?

https://maeevick.substack.com

#gamedev #buildinpublic

🧵 5/5
